metadata.title: CVE-2020-25074 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
The cache action in action/cache.py in MoinMoin through 1.9.10 allowsdirectory traversal through a crafted HTTP request. An attacker who canupload attachments to the wiki can use this to achieve remote codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-moinmoin - 1.9.9-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moin package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.9-1ubuntu1.2').
